doc.title: Canon-Ieatishootipost Photography Workshop: And the winners are.......
doc.text: The/DT Canon-ieat/NN food/NN photography/JJ workshop/NN attracted/IN 50/CD participants/NN which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT largest/JJ turnout/NN to/TO date/VB ./. I/PRP think/VB it/PRP reflects/RB the/DT increasing/VBD popularity/NN of/IN taking/VBG pictures/NN of/IN food/NN before/IN we/PRP eat/VBD to/TO upload/VB onto/IN the/DT internet/NN ./. Everyone/JJ loves/NN to/TO make/VB their/PRP$ friends/NNS drool/RB !/. Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO all/PDT the/DT participants/NN who/WP signed/VBZ up/RP to/TO attend/VB the/DT workshop/NN !/. We/PRP ran/VBD a/DT competition/NN to/TO give/VB everyone/RB a/DT chance/NN at/IN showing/NN off/IN their/PRP$ new/JJ found/JJ skills/NN and/CC I/PRP am/VBP very/RB happy/JJ to/TO present/VB our/PRP$ winners/NN !/. If/IN you/PRP would/MD like/VB to/TO attend/VB the/DT next/JJ workshop/NN ,/, please/RB write/VB to/TO ./. We/PRP shall/VB start/VB organizing/IN the/DT next/JJ one/CD when/WRB there/EX are/VBP enough/JJ students/NN to/TO make/VB up/IN the/DT class/NN ./. Well/RB done/VBN everyone/NN !/. Keep/DT shooting/NN !/. Carolyn/PRP has/VBZ made/VBD very/RB clever/RB use/VB of/IN the/DT wire/JJ mesh/NN with/IN a/DT shallow/JJ depth/NN of/IN field/NN to/TO create/VB a/DT visually/JJ stunning/NN photo/NN ./. The/DT placement/NN of/IN the/DT bun/NN along/IN the/DT one/CD third/NN line/NN is/VBZ nicely/RB balanced/VBN by/IN the/DT diagonal/NN lines/NN and/CC the/DT interesting/JJ effect/NN created/NN by/IN the/DT wire/NN mesh/NN ./. June/NNP has/VBZ very/RB cleverly/JJ used/VBD the/DT red/JJ cherries/NN to/TO add/VB complement/VB the/DT green/JJ and/CC yellow/JJ pastry/NN ./. She/PRP has/VB applied/VB the/DT rule/NN of/IN thirds/NN in/IN her/PRP composition/VBZ as/IN well/RB as/IN using/VBG the/DT edge/NN of/IN the/DT lazy/JJ susan/NN as/IN a/DT diagonal/NN to/TO break/VB up/IN the/DT background/NN ./. Raymond/RB has/VBZ taken/VBN advantage/NN of/IN the/DT beautiful/JJ display/VB dish/NN as/IN a/DT backdrop/NN for/IN the/DT green/JJ banana/NN leaves/VBZ ./. Again/RB placing/IN the/DT subject/NN according/IN the/DT the/DT rule/NN of/IN thirds/NN and/CC making/VBG use/VB of/IN the/DT plate/NN to/TO create/VB diagonal/NN lines/NN ./.
